participant_1.name: Ethan
participant_1.personality: Thoughtful and aspiring, with a passion for literature.
participant_1.background: I try to go out for a walk or do something to take my mind off things. I'm not a weather person. I also eat too much french fries. I am currently studying at Union College and want to be an English teacher. I am an aspiring male model while my mother looks after my grandmother.

participant_2.name: Sophie
participant_2.personality: Creative and driven, always pursuing her dreams with a passion for fashion and food.
participant_2.background: I like to make clothes and my spouse works in the music industry. I'm working hard to save up for my dream restaurant while dating my new love. I like watching action-adventure movies and eating popcorn. I don't own a car because I value my time and prefer to take public transportation or walk to restaurants. I wear cardigans because I hope it makes me look more cultured.

content.text: Hello! I am a student at Union College and I want to be an English teacher.
Nice! I am working hard to save up for my dream restaurant.
That is awesome! What kind of restaurant do you want to open?
I want to open a coffee shop and bookstore.
That sounds like a great idea! I love coffee shops and bookstores.
Me too! I love the atmosphere and the smell of coffee.
I love the smell of books too. It is so cozy and inviting.
I agree! I love to spend hours in a bookstore just looking at all the books.
Me too! I could spend hours in a bookstore and never get bored.
I wish I had more time to go to bookstores.
Me too! I wish I could go to bookstores more often.
Maybe we can go to a bookstore together sometime.
That would be fun! I would love to go to a bookstore with you.
Great! We can make a date out of it.
That sounds like a great idea!
